Reviews.Title: I've had one 2 years and still like it
Reviews.Author: E. Jones "ejones"
Reviews.Content: Let me say right off... this is NOT an iPhone. But, I LIKE IT.I'm a bit suspicious of a few other reviews here, as many were made within the same couple of days.It has touch screen, and is a tip smaller, but do not expect the ease of an iphone.  On the good side, I can do almost anything an iphone can do.  I can browse the internet, add applications, use it for GPS navigation in the car.  The camera works well, except in low light conditions. It has built in voice commands, for when I'm driving or such, to call, pull up contacts, or hear music.  Wifi works well.  Bluetooth is easy.  Also, I threw in a micro SD card, giving me PLENTY of room for applications, pictures, video and music.The phone has been dropped many times, kicked, and sat on, and it's still chugging along fine.BUT, I am a techie person, so I can install apps easily, use them with ease, and figure out any problems (not that there are many).  If you don't know what a micro SD card is, or how to sync a phone, you might want to get an iphone or android phone.  I wouldn't get this phone for my mom, but maybe my dad.There are a couple of minor annoyances.  The screen is a tip smaller than iphones, and the soft keys are thus a bit smaller, meaning you have to be a bit more precise typing , so if you're an NFL linebacker with huge hands, be warned.(but that's why it comes with a stylus)  The screen is a tip slower than I'd like to orient to the proper 'up' direction. (Like 1.5 seconds to the iphones .5 seconds).  Also, every so often the screen touch alignment goes a tip off, causing me to re-align it... a 15 second process (maybe once a week)Oh, this phone definitely DOESN'T have a 21 day standby time.  I would say max 5 days with NO activity at all.. MAX!..  Maybe 5-6 hours talk, and 2-3 days with normal use. Personally I re-charge every night.The phone is a windows mobile smartphone, so there is plenty of applications out there.  Just don't think it's as easy as installing as apple's or androids' apps stores.I can  upgrade to an iPhone for $50 now [with a 2 year contact :-(  ], but me and my Incite will travel together a bit longer.

Reviews.Title: Worst smartphone ever made.
Reviews.Author: F. Moses
Reviews.Content: This is the worst smartphone ever made.  I've owned quite a few, and thought I would be happy when I got this phone, but things got so bad that it ended up with a broken screen, and to say the least I was relieved.  I thought with an ok processor the phone would be pretty decent, but it is slow, unresponsive, worst touchscreen ever.  Why they made the screen so small for a touchscreen only phone i'll never know.  When my phone was "retired", I was so much at peace with a $15 go phone that actually worked, didn't freeze, and allowed me to make and receive calls.  I don't usually write reviews, but when I saw this sale on them and it was getting 4/5 stars I just had to say something.  This is NOT a good deal for this phone.  I would not even get this phone if they gave it away for free.  Run from this phone and any deal for it, and don't worry about looking back.  It is definitely not worth it.

Reviews.Title: Not sure if this was just a horrible phone or if it was defective
Reviews.Author: S. Lee
Reviews.Content: I gave this phone 3 stars because I'm not quite sure if it was defective or if it was just a bad phone. First off, it wasn't capable of taking pictures. I know that international versions of phones aren't capable of MMS in the U.S. but this phone wasn't capable of saving pictures either. Again, I sent my phone back and didn't request a replacement so I am still unsure to whether it was maybe just defective. Also, the touchscreen was extremely hard to use, even with the included stylus. The sensitivity of the touchscreen is probably the deal breaker for me. The features on the phone are great. It's powered by Windows so you get the use of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and other MS Office software. The phone was extremely easy to navigate and it was easy to organize and close windows/applications because of the drop down menu. Also, new emails and texts were displayed right on the home screen so there's no need to check periodically. Overall, I really like this phone except for the touchscreen and its inability to take pictures.

Reviews.Title: This phone is antiquated and inadiquate.  Does not work well.  We have 2 that we are almost done with.
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Landers "BlackJack"
Reviews.Content: THis phone is likely the worst smartphone we have owned.  It isn't worth 100 or 50.  Maybe if they reduced the price further it's not worth the money.

Reviews.Title: Worst phone ever!
Reviews.Author: Uygar Selman
Reviews.Content: It freezes all the time and you have to push the hidden button on the side to reset it. I carry a toothpick with me all the time. Sometimes even that doesn't work you have to take the battery out and re-install it.It is the worst, most unreliable piece of crap ever. I gave up whole LG brand because of this phone.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing "smart" phone
Reviews.Author: Nevasca
Reviews.Content: The phone is a disappointment. I bought one last year as a Christmas gift to myself thinking it would be a functional affordable smart phone. but only two weeks later the screen became unresponsive and the phone finish is easily scratched and chipped the volume with earphones is very low and even with the stylus it was difficult to navigate. less than a year later the battery is experiencing problems as it cant hold charge for any time exceeding 13 hours and this is when it is on standby no calls or texts sent or received. You cannot upgrade the phone to the newer version of windows mobile this was an overall waste of money as little as was spent on it i still feel like it was a lemon.

Reviews.Title: Not so great phone
Reviews.Author: D. Anzai
Reviews.Content: Needs stylus pen to write with sometimes, words too small to use fingers on LCD Screen. Sometimes the touch screen don't response to your finger tips. I do not care for it's menu its not friendly. Pix is ok. Receiving and calling is OK, no drop calls or interference.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it
Reviews.Author: jane
Reviews.Content: WORST PHONE EVER!  You cannot see the screen in the sun but you can use it as a mirror to check your hair.  If you keep pounding on the screen you might be able to place a call, oops, no you can't.  The font is so small your slim fingernail may hit the other apps above or below what you really want (especially after pounding it continuously to get it to respond).  Thank goodness my two year plan was up!  The phone was locking up when people called! We had a heck of a good phone smashing party when the contract was up--even my teenagers HATED THIS PHONE!!!

Reviews.Title: CELL PHONE LG INCITE CT810
Reviews.Author: JOHNNY
Reviews.Content: El teléfono es muy bueno, es pantalla táctil, colores nítidos, buen sonido, tiene wifi, el sistema operativo es excelente, puede trabajar con las tres operadoras del Ecuador.

Reviews.Title: Muy completo
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: Muy completo seria la manera de generalizar este telefono, tiene un sitema operativo muy bonito, tiene una gran variedad de programas, comandos, acciones; las dimenciones del telefono facilitan su uso.

Reviews.Title: junk
Reviews.Author: brian
Reviews.Content: this phone is worthless it freezes all the time and i cant recieve or make calls the wi-fi dont work and it's not reading the memory card. dont buy this phone unless you want a paper weight.

Reviews.Title: good hardware but the software is expired and un-renewable!
Reviews.Author: Douglas F. Sheridan
Reviews.Content: The phone works, it takes pictures, receives calls and texts, but that is it.  It will not work as a smart phone and cannot access the internet. DO NOT BUY this phone unless you want an overpriced, outdated camera that you can make and receive calls on.  LG has an iron clad planned obsolescence built in that requires a firmware upgrade to repair.

Reviews.Title: A OK phone
Reviews.Author: si
Reviews.Content: It is a OK phone for the price. The response is slow even though it has a decent processor. You have to wait a few seconds to make quick dial. But the other features like window media player, work very well and I never have problem with windows applications too.

Reviews.Title: Agreed! Worst Device Ever!
Reviews.Author: MariaSmiles
Reviews.Content: I, too, used this phone and found it to be horrible. There are too many problems to list, not worth my time to type them, or your time to read them. I have had mobile devices (pagers, phones, pda's, etc.) since 1992. I know how they should work and what I can expect of them. This one delivers nothing but frustration. Nothing works well on this phone. Heed the warnings. Stay Far Away from this phone. And, yes, it has turned me off to the LG Brand, completely.

Reviews.Title: worst phone in the history of cell phone industry.
Reviews.Author: NAZIA M
Reviews.Content: i would rather die than use this phone. It does not even deserve to be named as "Cell Phone".But if you want to keep it in the museum as the most disfuntional phone then it will take a #1 position.I got it as charity as i went to a friend house and as i forgot to bring my charger , he gave to me saying i no longer use it..you can take it. so....plz dont waste your money on this.

Reviews.Title: VERY NICE PHONE
Reviews.Author: TOMMY GARCIA "TOMMY GARCIA"
Reviews.Content: THIS PHONE ITS A REALLY GREAT BUY AND A REALLY GREAT PRICE, IT WORKS VERY GOOD, TAKE NICE PICTURES, CLEAR SOUND, I RECOMEND IT

Reviews.Title: Nice Phone but out of date
Reviews.Author: Leon
Reviews.Content: I got this phone about two months ago and at first I love it but I keep running in toDown load problems because the phone is so old came out in 2008. Can’t downloadAnything went to LG website none of the app will download at all no matter what site I go toThe only good things I can say is I didn’t pay a lot for this phone  $70.00 dollars.Save your money and buy something you can use. No SKYPE, FACEBOOK, the only thingYou can do is Email.

Reviews.Title: Unlocked LG
Reviews.Author: Michael Kopp
Reviews.Content: Arrived in a timly manner , and works just as good as my old one . the old one died after 5 years of service

Reviews.Title: i hate this phone
Reviews.Author: robert bronson
Reviews.Content: this phone sucks I can't use no features the touch screen is no good and the screen is small garbage

Reviews.Title: She's a looker, but it's what's inside that counts
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Moses
Reviews.Content: I've been using an iPhone 4S for the past year, and may always use an iPhone from now on, but I'll admit that I sometimes miss this phone.When I first got this phone, right after it released, it was late 2008. This was shortly after the release of the iPhone 3G, when the App Store was still young and smartphones were still in a sort of infancy. Back in 2008, some people were still using flip-phones and Blackberies - it was very different than the current latest iPhone or latest Galaxy phone atmosphere. Touchscreen phones without keyboards were still something of a novelty, though the iPhone and Droid were beginning to break that perception.The LG Incite is made out of plastic, but it's still very nice looking. When the screen is off, it's basically a polished mirror. Build-wise, it feels nice. Unfortunately, even in 2008 its operating system was dated. Windows Mobile 6 didn't age well - although it was actually never very good. I used this phone for several months, but the touchscreen stopped functioning right, and it would frequently freeze and crash. I switched back to my old 8125, which was sturdier and more reliable with its hardware keyboard, then got a Blackberry, and finally switched to an iPhone. I still miss the Incite, though, sometimes. At least with a screen that reflective nobody could ever sneak up on me ;)

Reviews.Title: is a good phone
Reviews.Author: eddie4586
Reviews.Content: So far a good phone for the price.the battery hold the charge for a long time.The icons on the screen looks weird (fake )But overall good phone at good price

Reviews.Title: excellent phone
Reviews.Author: Hernan Etchegaray
Reviews.Content: is a phone of excellent performance, although some programs are trial versions that brings for 30 days. As pros we find the great number of features such as bluetooth, wiffi, gps, camera, etc.. On the other hand has icons windows mobile my kids, which is impresindible using a pencil, and access to functions is not very comfortable, the camera may have more resolution. But it has the best value for price-performance.

Reviews.Title: Commercial Invoice Request
Reviews.Author: Nayrobi Burguera
Reviews.Content: Good morning friends first commend you for the speed with which my order was dispatched to my mail agent in Miami. I have only one drawback. my agent to send me mail the package to the country where I live (VENEZUELA) you should send the invoice of the purchased product and unfortunately was not in the package thank many of you know send me the invoice of my purchase as soon as possible to the following email (nayrobi160979@hotmail.com) (arturo201276@hotmail.com) Thank you very much for the attention

Reviews.Title: Bad data connection
Reviews.Author: Marvi
Reviews.Content: The data connection does not work well. And warranty provider does not replay email you have to call them, then they look at your email, it is funny.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: Ash
Reviews.Content: lg has disappointed me with this phone. no longer will be interested in lg phones for a long long time.

Reviews.Title: Not That Bad
Reviews.Author: GOLFER
Reviews.Content: If you are coming from an old antiquated phone as i was you might have to read the manuel. but overall this phone exceeds my expectations. there are some quarks but not big enough to make me totally hate the phone. the touch screen is super responsive and the wifi is great. for the price this is the perfect phone if you dont want to upgrade your contract.

Reviews.Title: do not buy
Reviews.Author: manuel miguel brito avila
Reviews.Content: is a hoax not buy it never reaches the package and lost all the money that selling it said he will not dervolverme the money! is a pure hoax!

Reviews.Title: WAS A GOOD BUY
Reviews.Author: gregorio genao
Reviews.Content: THE ITEM CAME SOONER AND WAS NEW LIKE IT SAID I FEEL GLAD WITH THE COMPANY.I LIKE THE THAT PHONE THATS WHY I BUY IT

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY! WORST PHONE EVER
Reviews.Author: Audie Salas
Reviews.Content: Ok, let me tell you exactly how it isI bought 3, one for me, my sister in law saw it and love so she ask me to bought her another, my cousin saw it too and asked another one tooAll them presented touch screen problems on the 1st monthMine stop working on the 1st month, touchscreen was 99% bad, it doesnt matter where I click, it detected the touch on the bottom right cornerThe other 2 phones touchscreen wasnt working fine either, some times the touchscreen didnt work at allWhen you have a touchscreen phone is a HUGE deal, I couldnt unlock the phone, call, NOTHINGMy recommendation is aviod this phone

ProductInfo.Features:
Frequency: GSM/GPRS/EDGE: 850/900/1800/1900 MHz (Quad-Band). Compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T;/T-Mobile. Not all carrier features supported. Does not work with CDMA carriers
Business-oriented smartphone with Windows Mobile 6.1 OS, Wi-Fi networking, and 3-inch touchscreen
Tri-mode 3G-connectivity; compatible with AT&T; Navigator GPS turn-by-turn directions, AT&T; Mobile Music, Video Share service, and Mobile Banking
3-mp camera/camcorder;Bluetooth stereo music streaming;MicroSD expansion to 32 GB;direct push email;access to instant messaging;digital media player
Up to 8.7 hours of talk time, up to 504 hours ( 21 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: LG Incite CT810 Quadband Unlocked Phone with Touch Screen, GPS, WiFi and 3MP Camera - Unlocked Phone - US Warranty - Silver
